entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:33PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND HIGHER SURF ALONG BRISTOL BAY AND KUSKOKWIM DELTA COAST MONDAY... A unseasonably strong low is expected to track through the eastern Bering Sea Sunday night. Strong winds will develop as it moves towards the coastal areas along Bristol Bay and as far north as the Kuskokwim Delta after midnight through Monday morning.
